column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Conclusion:  Deep dish pizza - yummy.  Lou's was the best of the bunch.  The crust was perfectly crunchy
column2: the dough had the best mouth-feel
column5: and the toppings are a good amount.  They store your order info under your phone #
column6: so it's easy to tell them you want your usual - deluxe whole sausage
